message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you take 40.  We can work out a better deal later if you want.
Your offer was kind, Alice, but doesn't make sense with the inflation. How about we switch it up for this round?
I understand the inflation, Bob. Let's find a middle ground. I'll take 54, you take 46.  This way, we both get a decent share after the losses.
